name: Mysterious Urca and Stunning Sugarloaf View
description:
This walking tour with the rise to the postcard view from Sugar Loaf mountain will be yours unforgettable memory from Rio de Janeiro. 

You will find out interesting stories about Urca noble district, which is less famous around tourists.  Will have a unique opportunity to take stunning panoramic pictures by the water of Guanabara Bay and on top of the mountain as well as possibility to experiment delicious local specialty at famous and awarded Bar da Urca.
